entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, a young wizard. He is described as the one who is in control of the motorbike and sidecar.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who are trying to avoid the deadly trail of flame. They are described as swerving out of sight.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who is thrown flat onto his back by the surge of speed and tries to regain control of the motorbike and sidecar.

entities.name: umbrella
entities.description: Hagrid's flowery pink umbrella, which he uses in an attempt to repair the damage to the sidecar.

relationships.description: Harry sees the Death Eaters swerve out of sight to avoid the deadly trail of flame.
Hagrid pulls his flowery pink umbrella from inside his jacket pocket in an attempt to repair the damage to the sidecar.
Harry is in control of the motorbike and sidecar, and tries to regain control after it breaks away from the bike.
